name: VideoBloom
tag_list: add-video-online, publish-video-online, add-video-to-website, add-video-to-web-site, video-distribution, video-search-engine-optimization, video-analytics, video-monetization, vseo, video-advertsing, video-production, online-video-advertising, online-vide
overview:
VideoBloom is a “socially smart” video company focused on helping our clients connect, tell, sell and share their stories and products in today’s digital world.

At our core, we believe that all video is inherently social. Video is not created in a vacuum, it is meant to be spread. That’s why VideoBloom strives to make every video that passes through our hands be as socially smart as possible. That is our mission and driving force.

Since 2006, we’ve been a leading provider of powerful video technology and production solutions that help our clients build and expand their brands’ online experiences. VideoBloom was among the first to launch user-generated (UGC) videos when social media was still in its infancy. Since then, we’ve powered campaigns for some of the most recognizable and popular social media properties on the Web.

milestones.description: VideoBloom releases the Video Testimonial Widget, an innovative new product which powerfully enables users to collect video testimonials and reviews, instantly building trust while simultaneously increasing Web site conversions.
milestones.source_description: VideoBloom Launches Exclusive Video Testimonial Widget to Power Video Commerce
